Title: Relates to banning the sale of certain items relating to emotional support and therapy animals; penalties for improper identification of dogs
Summary: Relates to banning the sale of certain items relating to emotional support and therapy animals; increases the penalty for improper identification of dogs.
LawCode: Add ยง391-u, Gen Bus L; amd ยง118, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to banning the sale of certain items relating to emotional support and therapy animals; and to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to penalties for improper identification of dogs
